allProducts.productDescription: PUMA is one of the world’s leading Sports Brands, designing, developing, selling and marketing footwear, apparel and accessories. For 70 years, PUMA has established a history of making fast product designs for the fastest athletes on the planet. .

allProducts.productName: Platinum Metallic SoftFoam+ Women's Training Shoes
allProducts.productDescription: Step into affordable luxury with our Platinum Metallic Training Shoes. This fashionable, flirty silhouette features a SoftFoam+ sockliner and unique sculpting for an unparalleled look and feel that's sure to be a favourite among gym goers.
